rooms.description: Large, bright living room with eco-friendly features like natural light and ventilation. Designed with Vastu principles for a harmonious environment.
Spacious master bedroom with ample storage, natural ventilation and integrated wardrobe. Faces north for positive energy.
Guest bedroom with efficient use of space and built-in storage. Faces east.
Compact, eco-friendly kitchen designed for energy efficiency with natural light exposure and proper ventilation. Positioned towards the south.
Well-lit bathroom ensuring privacy and eco-friendly water usage with a rainwater collection system. Faces west.
Outdoor balcony adjoining the living room, offering scenic views of the central courtyard and garden.

openings.description: Main entry with eco-friendly design, integrating solar-powered lights and water-efficient fixtures.
Direct access to the swimming pool area from the courtyard. The pool is designed with a natural filtration system.
Central courtyard entrance providing ventilation and light throughout the house.

specific_features: Swimming Pool with natural filtration system
Central Courtyard for natural ventilation and light
Energy efficient installations like solar panels
site_details.notes: This design caters to a bachelor pad ensuring modern living, energy efficiency, and adherence to local building norms.
